description: Description for Belkin Mixit DuraTek Kevlar F8J207bt04 Lightning to USB Cable (Black) The Belkit Mixit DuraTek Lightning to USB Cable is made of Kevlar, a high strength synthetic fibre used as a reinforcing agent to strengthen the conductors and enhance protection. It has insulated conductors which reduce friction while creating added flexibility and protection. The shield-braid and metalized Mylar shielding helps to protect the cable from external electro-magnetic interference. Thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) cable jacket is soft, pliable, and environmentally friendly. Double-braided nylon exterior is abrasion resistant, reducing fraying and lasting longer. Abrasion Resistant One of the key ingredients of Belkit Mixit DuraTek Lightning to USB Cable’s secret strength is Kevlar. This resistant aramid fibre is used the world over for everything from bullet resistant vests and crash helmets to surfboards and extreme sports gear. Strong Kevlar strands are built into the cable adding ultimate strength. Able to flex without stretching, these fibers provide structure to keep the wires inside from damage. The external cable braiding is made from a premium and hard-wearing nylon material. Double braiding is a technique used in rope making and gives maximum strength and added resilience. This makes the cable abrasion resistant, more flexible, lightweight and less prone to fraying. Convenient To Use Inside the cable, many wires co-exist to provide better functionality and conductivity. Insulation protects the wires from damage as the cable bends and flexes, but some can cause stiffness, affecting the overall suppleness of the cable. The highly flexible insulation within the Belkit Mixit DuraTek Lightning to USB Cable minimizes friction, allowing the cable to bend easily and the wires within to move without damage. The 18mm strain relief where the cable joins the connector head has been optimized to withstand the greatest amount of bend cycles. Made from flexible TPE, this added length and flexibility helps to absorb stress and reinforce the juncture between the cable and the connector head to prevent separation. Proven in testing to withstand 5000+ cycles where the cable is bent to 180-degrees, this cable is highly resistant to splitting and breakage. Not just flexible, TPE is also smooth, tactile and more environmentally-friendly than the standard PVC.

description: Description for Sony Micro USB Lightening Cable (CP-AL100, Black) OverviewBring home the portable and utilitarian SONY CP-A100 Lightening Cable- Black and enjoy streaming videos from laptops, smartphones, and other different devices. Wide diameter cable for faster charging Sony's wider diameter cables offers a faster-charging speed. With compatible devices, Sony's USB cable support up to 2.4A input/output, for up to five times faster charging than other cables. Enjoy the fastest data transfers to your USB 2.0 devices with speeds up to 480Mbps. Sony USB cables last twice as long as other brands thanks to their wide diameter and the use of quality materials. Tested to withstand over 3,000 bends and ten-thousands of connection cycles, for safe and reliable performance with both charging and data transfer. Remarkable Features SONY CP-A100 Lightening Cable- Black is made for product perfectly with Apple devices in terms of compatibility and specifications certified by Apple's MFi Program. Use this CP-AL100 cable to charge and transfer data from standard USB Type-A ports to Apple device.  Sony’s wider diameter cables offer a faster-charging speed. With compatible devices, Sony's USB cables support up to 2.4 A output, for up to five times faster charging than other USB 2.0 cables. USB cables last twice as long as other brands thanks to their wide diameter and the use of quality materials. Tested to withstand over 3,000 bends and 10,000 connection cycles, for safe and reliable performance with both charging and data transfer. This is available in a 1.0 m (3.28 ft) length, this cable is ideal for office or home use, or on the go. Use it for PC data transfer or USB charging from wall-plug AC adaptors, portable battery chargers, and car charger. Enjoy fast data transfer speeds of up to 480 Mbps.

description: Description for LG 81 cm (32 inch) HD LED Smart TV (32LK616BPTB, Black) OverviewRevel into the world of endless and remarkable entertainment with an amazing picture quality with LG LED 81cm 32LK616BPTB. Fret no longer over complex shortcuts or perplexing navigation menus. With Magic Remote at your fingertips, just move the cursor over your favorite content and enjoy the video of your choice with just a click. LG Magic Remote lets you operate and control your viewing from virtually any corner of the room and accessibility is a single click away. Hard to believe but true. Just long press the ‘0’ key on your Magic Remote and open your preferred content. Magic Remote additionally offers Universal Control. In layman’s terms, control and access your speakers, set-top box, BDP, and even satellite TV, all using just one remote! It is also possible to share your smartphone screen on TV and view your mobile using this magic remote making your life easier. With LG LED 81cm 32LK616BPTB, Multi-Tasking too is no big deal. Thanks to its convenient settings, a plus is easy photos & videos-viewing using Cloud Photo & Video app on TV. Active HDR or High Dynamic Range is the next benchmark for delivering a staggering picture quality. LG HDR10 Pro ensures that images per frame are supported and dynamic tone mapping expertise offers stunning viewing experience. These wonderful strokes splashed across your screen with detailing and unbelievable contrasts, be it the darker depths or the subtler shades, are simply amazing. description: Description for LG 109 cm (43 inch) 4k Ultra HD LED Smart TV (43UK6780PTE, Black) The LG 43UK6780 4K UHD LED Television comes with a host of connectivity features to ensure you can expand the horizons of your entertainment. It supports internet browsing to keep you connected at all times and therefore it allows you to experience the online world on the huge screen. This fantastic television set has a 4k Jazz Sound with a built-in woofer that enhances your audio experience. The television comes backed with technology to satisfy all your entertainment needs. Enjoy crisp and vivid pictures on your screen so that you never miss a detail while the fantastic and powerful sound gives the stunning visuals a new dimension. 4K Active HDR DTS Virtual: X is a new sound post-processing technology that provides an immersive, multi-dimensional sound experience without additional speakers. HDR (High Dynamic Range) is the new standard for picture quality. It provides delicate detail and lifelike colour with a wider range of contrast. LG UHD TV supports multi HDR formats including HDR10 Pro and HLG Pro. Apart from giving you crystal clear picture, the LG 43UK6780 4K UHD LED Television with its ability to connect to a wide range of devices makes it an extremely versatile option. The USB and HDMI ports allow you to connect a wide range of devices and enjoy your personalized and preferred entertainment for an immersive visual experience. Lovely Display This fantastic smart television has an Ultrabright IPS 4K Display that provides you with stunning visuals and combined with the 4K Jazz Sound it gives you a complete entertainment experience. The IPS 4K Display yields a more accurate and lifelike picture from a wider viewing angle. There are pre-programmed default picture modes. These pre-programmed modes are standardized for contrast, brightness, sharpness, colour and hue. The television allows you to enjoy rich colours and distortion free pictures from any side of the room to give your entertainment levels a new dimension.
